title: The Lost Artifact
description: The player is tasked with finding a valuable artifact that has been missing for centuries, rumored to be hidden in a treacherous mountain range.
subquest: Seek guidance from the wise hermit in the nearby village.
Find the ancient map rumored to lead to the artifact.
Traverse through the perilous snowstorm to reach the mountain range.
Solve the riddles guarding the entrance to the hidden cave.
Defeat the ferocious guardian protecting the artifact.
Escape the collapsing cave before it seals the treasure forever.
